Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-2291 affecting package pgbouncer for versions less than 1.24.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-2291 affecting package pgbouncer for versions less than 1.24.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package pgbouncer is earlier than 1.24.1-1, affected by CVE-2025-2291
